items.value:
Dan has a bad habit of being too noisy. 

Tell about one of your bad habits

If Nick does something wrong, he feels better if he says, "I'm sorry".

What is something you are sorry for?

When all the lights went out, Simon was afraid. 

What are some things Simon could do?

Jamie likes to eat food that will help her stay healthy. 

Talk about your health.

Jodie was tempted to cheat on a test.

If you have ever cheated, tell about it.

Jan threw a tantrum when she did not get her own way. 

Do you ever throw tantrums? Talk about it.

Alex goes to the doctor for a check-up at least once a year. 

Tell about going to the doctor.

When Katie had to give her speech, she felt nervous.

When do you feel nervous?

Winona was so sick, she had to stay in bed for a week.

Tell about a time when you were sick.

When Gill moved away, Ted realized how much he loved her. 

Tell about someone you love.

Once Rick pretended to be hurt so he would get attention.

What do you do when you want attention?

Angelos says, "It's not good to hate somebody."

Do you agree or disagree? Why?

Jake broke his neighbour's window and blamed his friend. Now he feels guilty. 

Tell about a time when you felt guilty.

Maria needed a lot of courage to rescue the cat from the tall tree.

Tell about a time when you had courage.

Donald thinks he can escape from his troubles by running away.

What do you think about running away?

Lela likes to watch adventure shows on TV.

Talk about your favourite TV show and why you like it.

Penelope got mad at Chad and said, "I'm never going to share again!" 

Say something about sharing.

Tristan threw mud on James's sweater. James got mad and wanted to fight.

What do you think about fighting?

Phoebe felt embarrassed when she didn't know the answer to the question. 

When do you feel embarrassed?

RÃ©mi likes to recall memories from his past. 

Share 2 memories you have of your past.

On rainy days Cat feels depressed.

When do you feel depressed?

Michelle cries when she watches a sad movie on TV.

When do you cry?

Philippa asked her mother for help then stubbornly insisted on doing things her way.

Tell about a time when you were stubborn.

Maisie's grandmother died and she went to the funeral. 

Tell about a death in your family.

When Daisy is sad, she wants to eat.

What do you do when you feel sad?

When David admitted he was afraid, he learned that everybody has fears.

What is one of your fears?

Lucy was disappointed when she wasn't invited to the party.

Tell about one of your disappointments.

Duke can never play outside because his legs are crippled.

What are some things you could do with Duke if you were his friend?

When Francesca's guest did not arrive, she became worried.

What do you worry about?

Sometimes Dick makes mistakes.

Tell about a mistake you have made.

Olga says, "Everyone has a different personality."

Talk about your personality.

Sometimes Clayton gets frustrated with his family and wishes he could change them.

If you had the power, how would you change your family?

Tina wants her friends to respect her.

Talk about someone you respect and tell why you respect them.

Kate can often be found admiring herself in the mirror. 

How do you feel when you look in the mirror?

Rupert thinks everyone has forgotten his birthday.

How would you feel if everyone forgot your birthday?

Mizumi is writing a song about love and needs help.

Share some things about love that she could put in her song.

Sometimes it is hard for Jose to be honest.

Tell about a time when you found it hard to be honest.

Michelle refuses to enter the contest because she doesn't like to lose.

Say something about losing.

Gene felt left out when his friends went to the picnic without him.

When do you feel left out?

Pippa felt tricked by Matthew and wanted to get revenge.

Did you ever want to get revenge? Talk about it.

When Aaron wants attention, he pouts and cries.

What do you think his friends should do?

Dad says, "You can learn from the past."

What have you learned from your past?

Liz talks so much that she doesn't listen to others.

Talk about someone who listens when you talk to them.

When Mike compares himself to others, he doesn't like himself.

Do you like yourself? Why?

Lydia's friends gave her some pills.

What would you do if your friend gave you some pills and asked you to take them? Why?

Mark broke his mother's vase and blamed his little brother.

Have you ever been blamed for something you did not do? Talk about it.

Vanessa loves to give advice to her friends.

Whose advice do you listen to?

Robin feels angry when someone teases her.

When do you feel angry?

Elon wants to go to Disneyworld but can't afford to go.

What is something you want to do but can't afford to do?

Danny and his brother are afraid of ghosts.

What do you think of ghosts?

Dwayne says, "You can never learn enough."

Do you agree or disagree? Why?

Sometimes Eric teases Kenny.

How do you feel when someone teases you?

Sometimes Sophie has nightmares.

Tell about a nightmare you remember.

Sometimes Eric feels jealous when his friend gets something he doesn't.

If you have ever been jealous, talk about it.

Mark tells Priscilla he has a "happiness pill."

Do you think a pill can make someone happy? Talk about it.

When Peter had failing grades on his report card, he was very sad.

Talk about grades and report cards.

Taylor tried to talk Dustin into doing something wrong.

Do your friends ever try to talk you into doing things that are wrong? Talk about it.

Vincent has a talent for oil painting.

What are some of your talents?

Rose loves to sing her favourite song for her friends.

What is your favourite song and why do you like it?

Marty thinks an "adventure" is doing something new and unusual.

Tell about an adventure in your life.

Jason wants to go camping so he can sleep in a tent.

What do you think about camping?

Henry doesn't know which holiday is his favourite.

What is your favourite holiday? Why do you like it?

Judith must do her chores before she can play.

How do you feel about doing chores?

Sadie wants Vera to enter a race to compete with her.

Say something about competition.

When Marcel gave something away, he expected to receive something in return.

When you give something away, do you expect to get something back? Why?

Louis enjoyed doing a good deed for his neighbour.

Tell about a good deed you have done.

David does not like to speak in front of his class. He says he lacks confidence.

Talk about confidence.

Robin carries a rabbit's foot for good luck.

Do you believe in good luck charms?

Paul wants to be grown up but learns that adults have a lot of responsibility.

What responsibilities do you think adults have?

Trixie likes to curl up with her favourite book and read.

Tell about your favourite book or story and why you like it.

Donald thinks he would be the happiest person in the world if he had a lot of money.

How would you feel if you had a lot of money? What would you do with it?
